S01sumagavu:594: SumAv_193: ayaṃ kapphiṇo rājāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīm anupraveśya jetavanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01sumagavu:595: sahadarśanād asya yo rūpe rūpamada aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ,
S01sumagavu:597: SumAv_194: tato bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam: aho bata,
S01sumagavu:598: śakro devānām indra aindraṃ dhanur ādāyāgacched iti.
S01sumagavu:599: SumAv_195: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sārathiveśenaindraṃ dhanur upanāmitavān. tato bhagavatā tad dhanur upanāmitam. tad utkṣeptum api na śaknoti,
S01sumagavu:601: SumAv_196: tato bhagavatā saptāyomayyo bheryo nirmitāḥ,
S01sumagavu:602: svayam eva tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣipto yena saptāyomayyo bheryaś chidrīkṛtās,
S01sumagavu:607: dhūnīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāraṃ iva kuñjaraḥ //
S01sumagavu:608: SumAv_198: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
S01sumagavu:610: SumAv_199: sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ,
S01sumagavu:612: SumAv_200: tato bhagavatāsya cittam ājñāya rājaveśam antardhāpya dharmo deśitah. yenāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivāreṇa yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtavān,
S01sumagavu:613: tato dṛṣṭasatyaś ca bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ. so 'yam āgaccati. (17)
S01sumagavu:614: SumAv_201: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ānandaḥ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:615: SumAv_202: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
S01sumagavu:616: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:619: ayaṃ ca bhagavatā indriyaguptadvārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:620: SumAv_204: ayaṃ ca bhagavataś caturbhir aṅgulair ūnaḥ suvarṇavarṇo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ.
S01sumagavu:621: SumAv_205: anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe madhyamaṃ chattram āropitam. tasya karmaṇo vipākenārdhatṛtīyāni cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi;
S01sumagavu:622: yady etarhi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyad etarhi apy anena balacakravartirājyam akariṣyat.
S01sumagavu:623: SumAv_206: ayaṃ ca bhagavatā balāt pravrajitaḥ. ayaṃ ca bhagavato mātṛsvasāputro bhrātā bhavati. sa eṣāgacchati. (18)
S01sumagavu:624_0: SumAv_207: atrāntarenāyuṣmān rāhulaś cakravartiveśam abhinirmāya saptaratnasamanvāgataś
S01sumagavu:624_1: caturaśītyā bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ samanugamyamānaś caturaśītyā nāgasahasrair upoṣadhanāgarājapramukhaiś
S01sumagavu:625: SumAv_208: taṃ dṛsṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
S01sumagavu:631: SumAv_210: bhagavataḥ putro 'yaṃ pitur ujjhitāṃ śriyam uddyotamānaḥ,
S01sumagavu:632: sarvacakravartiprativiśiṣṭatarām ṛddhim upadarśayann upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:636: kṛtvā buddhasuto 'bhyupaiti nabhasā veśaṃ ca rājñām ayaṃ
S01sumagavu:637: nāmnā rāhula ity aveti sumahate sampūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ //
S01sumagavu:638: SumAv_212: bhittvorvīṃ jalavat prayānti munayaḥ kecit sṛjanto 'nalaṃ
S01sumagavu:639: ramyatoyadharā ivāśu jagati spaṣṭaṃ kṣaranto jalam /
S01sumagavu:643: SumAv_213: saṃprasthitesu bhikṣusaṃghesu atrāntareṇa tathāgatapraveśaḥ. bhagavāṃs tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno,
S01sumagavu:644: yathāsamāhite citte bhagavataḥ kāyād raśmayo niścaranti,
S01sumagavu:646: yair ayaṃ loke udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsito yāvac ca śrāvastīṃ yāvac ca puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaram.
S01sumagavu:647: SumAv_214: atrāntareṇa sarve lokā bhagavantam abhiniṣkramantaṃ paśyanti,
S01sumagavu:649: SumAv_215: atha brahmā sahāṃpatir bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājñāya sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarair devair āgatya bhagavato dakṣiṇe pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:650: SumAv_216: śakro 'pi devānām indraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarair devair āgatya vāme pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:651: SumAv_217: tumburusupriyapramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi gandharvaśatāny āgatya bhagavato 'grato vividhair vādyagītanṛttaviśeṣair upasthānaṃ kurvanto gacchanti.
S01sumagavu:652: SumAv_218: anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti.
S01sumagavu:653: SumAv_219: upariṣṭāc ca bhagavato 'psaraso divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01sumagavu:657: SumAv_220: tena khalu punaḥ samayenānyatarasmin araṇyāyatane sapta ṛṣisahasrāṇi prativasanti.
S01sumagavu:658: SumAv_221: adrākṣus te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātrimśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam,
S01sumagavu:666: SumAv_222: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathacittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01sumagavu:671: SumAv_223: atha te ṛṣayo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā,
S01sumagavu:672: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte tasthuḥ.
S01sumagavu:673: SumAv_224: tato bhagavatā teṣām ṛṣīṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:674: yāṃ śrutvā tair ṛṣibhir viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:675: SumAv_225: atha te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paricārya saṃprasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:676: SumAv_226: tena khalu samayena puṇḍravardhane nagare 'ṣṭādaśa dvārāṇy ababhūvan.
S01sumagavu:680: yan nv aham aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāya svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praveśayam iti.
S01sumagavu:681: SumAv_228: atha bhagavān aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāyā svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:682: SumAv_229: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy āścaryāṇy atyadbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca:
S01sumagavu:693: gṛhagatāni ca vividhāni vādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
S01sumagavu:704: SumAv_230: evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā praviśya yena sumāgadhāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ.
S01sumagavu:705: SumAv_231: atha sumāgadhā svayam eva gośīrṣacandanodakena bhṛṅgāraṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ pādodakam anuprayacchati bhikṣusaṃghasya ca.
S01sumagavu:706: SumAv_232: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyaivam āha:
S01sumagavu:707: dhanyās te paravādivādamathanaṃ paśyanti ye te mukhaṃ
S01sumagavu:708: vistīrṇe sadasi sthitasya vacanaṃ śṛṇvanti ye vā mudā /
S01sumagavu:709: lābhas tasya mahān bhaviṣyati ca yaḥ pādau tava śrīnidher
S01sumagavu:710: mūrdhnā caiva karadvayena vinayāt saṃpīḍya vandiṣyate //
S01sumagavu:711: SumAv_233: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:712: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati.
S01sumagavu:713: SumAv_234: atha puṇḍravardhananivāsī janakāyo bhagavantam apaśyaṃs tadgṛhaṃ bhettum ārabdhaḥ. tato bhagavatā tadgṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmitaṃ,
S01sumagavu:714: yataḥ sarvo mahājanakāya ādarśanagatam iva bhagavantaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca.
S01sumagavu:716: sphaṭikamayam abhūt tad eva ramyaṃ maṇikanakākṣaratnabhakticitraṃ /
S01sumagavu:717: sthitam iva purato munīndracandraṃ nagarajano 'pi nirīkṣate samagraḥ //
S01sumagavu:718: SumAv_236: prasādāromāñcitasarvagātrāḥ kṛtāñjaliṃ mūrdhni nipātya hastam /
S01sumagavu:719: narā namanti sma munīndracandraṃ surā ivendraṃ bhavanodarastham //
S01sumagavu:720: SumAv_237: atha bhagavān kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ.
S01sumagavu:721: SumAv_238: tataḥ sumāgadhāpramukho 'ntarjanakāyas te ca nāgarās te ca ṛṣayas te ca devāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavantaṃ parivāryāvasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:722: SumAv_239: tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ ca tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃpravedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:723: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścic chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:726: kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:735: SumAv_240: yad bhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā.
S01sumagavu:740: yat sumāgadhayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam iti.
S01sumagavu:742: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvani buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya kāñcanamālayā yad buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:744: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kurute, bhāṣiṣye.
S01sumagavu:747: 'tīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
S01sumagavu:748: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S01sumagavu:749: sa bārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve.
S01sumagavu:750: SumAv_244: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kṛkī nāma rājā babhūva.
S01sumagavu:751: SumAv_245: tasya duhitā kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā,
S01sumagavu:753: SumAv_246: sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā,
S01sumagavu:754: rājñaḥ kṛkina iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:757: SumAv_248: tayā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'nitike mahān cittaprasāda utpanno,
S01sumagavu:759: SumAv_249: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā kṛkinā daśa svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ:
S01sumagavu:771: SumAv_250: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaś trastaś cintayati:
S01sumagavu:772: mā me itonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:773: SumAv_251: tato rājñā svapnādhyāyavido brāhmaṇān āhūya svapnān niveditavān.
S01sumagavu:774: SumAv_252: te kāñcanamālāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayanti: rājan,
S01sumagavu:775: yā te sarvajanapriyā tasyā rudhireṇa yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ,
S01sumagavu:778: svapnān dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā rājyajīvitahāriṇo 'nenopāyena svastir devasya bhaviṣyati.
S01sumagavu:781: tāṃ vyāpādayitukāmā brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. varaṃ mamaiva maraṇaṃ,
S01sumagavu:783: SumAv_254: kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:787: iti. tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa niveditaḥ. sā kathayati:
S01sumagavu:788: eṣa bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bārāṇasīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve,
S01sumagavu:789: taṃ bhagavantaṃ gatvā pṛcchatha. yathā te bhagavān vyākaroti tathaivaṃ dhāraya.
S01sumagavu:790: SumAv_255: tato rājā mahatā śrīsamudāyena kāñcanamālayā sārdhaṃ barāṇasyā nirgatya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:791: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:794_0: SumAv_256: atha bhagavān kṛkinaṃ rājānaṃ dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati
S01sumagavu:794_1: samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01sumagavu:795: SumAv_257: atha kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān nivedyaivam āha: mā me,
S01sumagavu:797: tatonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:801: na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyatīti jīvitasya cāntarāyaḥ.
S01sumagavu:804: vātāyanena hastī nirgacchan puccho lagna iti,
S01sumagavu:805: bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S01sumagavu:806: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti. tasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle aśrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas,
S01sumagavu:807: te rudanto 'śrumukhān bandhūn utsṛjya pravrajya vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:811: tasyaiva śravakā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti śraddhānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ,
S01sumagavu:816: tasyaiva śrāvakāḥ śaktuprasthasya hetor indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:820: tasyaiva śrāvakās taṃ tīrthikavākyam anugṛhya saddharmeṇa samīkariṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:824: tasyaiva śrāvakā asaṃyatās te śīlavanto bhikṣūn niṣkāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:828: tasyaiva śrāvakā āryasaṃghasya pratipāditam ārāmaṃ saṃgham ālaṃbīkṛtya kecid abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñāḥ saṃghād ācchidya puṣpaphalaṃ svajanebhyo dāsyanti,
S01sumagavu:832: tasyaiva śrāvakā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā ātmanāpattim āpannāḥ śrāddhānām api bhikṣūṇām āpattiṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:836: tasmin samaye vikalendriyā api rājāno bhaviṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:839: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhir janair ākṛṣyate na ca śīryata iti,
S01sumagavu:849: na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitāntarāyo vā.
S01sumagavu:850: SumAv_259: tato bhagavatā tasya rājñas tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:851: yāṃ śrutvā caturaśītyā prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:852: SumAv_260: kāñcanamālayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:854: bhikṣavaḥ yāsau kāñcanamālā iyam eva sā sumāgadheti.
S01sumagavu:855: SumAv_262: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
S01sumagavu:857: kāñcanamālayā karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhye kule pratyajātā yena kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā iti.
S01sumagavu:861: pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni. kāñcanamālayaiva,
S01sumagavu:863: karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati. na,
S01sumagavu:869: api tūpātteṣu eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca.
S01sumagavu:870: SumAv_264: na pranaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
S01sumagavu:871: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
S01sumagavu:875: tayā pratyekabuddhasya caitye nānāvicitrāṃ palālamālāṃ granthayitvā samāropya prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:876: SumAv_266: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatrayatropapadye 'haṃ tatratatra kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jāyeyam iti. kiṃ manyadhve,
S01sumagavu:878: iyam asau kāñcanamālā. yad anayā prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:879: tena pañcajanmaśatāni kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā.
S01sumagavu:880: SumAv_267: paṇadvayaṃ ca tayā paṭāntāvabaddhaṃ vimucyāryasaṃghāya dattaṃ;
S01sumagavu:882: SumAv_268: atha bhagavān sumāgadhāpramukhaṃ puṇḍravardhananivāsinaṃ mahājanakāyam abhiprasādya prakrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:883: tathaiva rddhyā sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena śrāvastīm āgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:890: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya iti. tasmāt tarhi,
S01sumagavu:893: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāma ity evaṃ vo,
S01sumagavu:897: te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti. sumāgadhāvadānaṃ samāptam.
